node.title: Commercial Roofing Market (By Roof Type- Single Ply Roofing, Cool Roofs, Vegetable Roofs, Traditional Asphalt Shingles; By Distribution Channel- Two Step Master Distribution, Lumberyards, Specialty One Step, Retailers, Purchasing Cooperatives and Buying Group, Direct Sales to End Users) – Europe Industry Analysis, Size, Share, Growth, Trends and Forecast, 2016 – 2025
node.market:
The report covers the analysis and forecast of the commercial roofing market in Europe which is further bifurcated by countries. The study provides historic data for 2016 and estimated data have been provided for 2017 along with the forecasted market numbers for the period between 2018 and 2025, in terms of revenue (US$ Mn).

 

Roofing is construction materials used to cover the building tops. Roofing materials used in commercial buildings are termed as commercial roofing. Wide diversity of materials is used to yield roofing products such as metal, polyvinyl, thermoplastics polyolefin, modified bitumen, cool roofs, and green construction materials. Commercial roofing products are available in a wide variability of price ranges and design alternatives. The commercial roofing market has profited from the diversity of construction accomplishments demanded across the world, as it has commanded to steady investment and link of lucrative revenue. The European economy is on the verge of a tectonic shift towards developing countries of Eastern Europe from the developed countries of western Europe because of an economic shift towards the emerging market of developing countries such as Bulgaria, Croatia, Hungary, Albania, Georgia to name a few. Mounting industrialization and urbanization in developing countries and renovation and reconstruction activities in developed countries are expected to offer productive opportunities to the commercial roofing market in Europe throughout the forecast period.

 

The study provides a detailed view of the Europe commercial roofing market, by segmenting it based on material type, distribution channel, and country wise demand. Country wise segmentation includes the current and forecast demand for Austria, Belgium, Denmark, Finland, France, Germany, Hungary, Ireland, and Poland and so on. The segmentation also includes material types and distribution channel in all the above-mentioned countries in Europe.

 

The competitive profiling of the key players in the Europe commercial roofing market across twenty-two countries is included in the study. These include different business strategies adopted by the leading players and their recent developments, as in the field of commercial roofing.

A comprehensive analysis of the market dynamics that is inclusive of market drivers and restraints is part of the report. Additionally, the report includes potential opportunities in the commercial roofing market in Europe and at different country levels. Market dynamics are the factors which impact the market growth; hence their analysis helps to understand the ongoing trends of the European market. Therefore, the report provides the forecast of the global market for the period from 2017 to 2025, besides offering an inclusive study of the commercial roofing market.

 

The report provides the size of the commercial roofing market of Europein2016 and the forecast for the next eight years up to 2025. The size of the Europe commercial roofing is provided in terms of volume and revenue. Market revenue is defined in US$ Mn. The market dynamics prevalent in UK, France, Germany, Spain, Poland, Austria, and Belgium have been considered in estimating the growth of the Europe market.

 

Market estimates for this study have been based on volume and revenue being derived through country wise pricing trends. Demand for commercial roofing has been derived by analyzing the demand in Europe and at different country-level for commercial roofing in each segment for its respective functions. The Europe commercial roofing market has been analyzed based on expected demand. Forecasts have been based on expected demand from commercial roofing applications. We have used the bottom-up approach to estimate the Europe revenue and the volume of the commercial roofing market, split into countries. Based on the material type, distribution channel, we have summed up the individual revenues and volume from all the countries to achieve the European revenue for commercial roofing. The distribution channel split of the market has been derived using a bottom-up approach for each country market separately, with the Europe distribution channel segment split being an integration of country level estimates. Companies were considered for the market share analysis, based on their innovation and application and revenue generation. In the absence of specific data related to the sales of commercial roofing of several privately held companies, calculated assumptions have been made in view of the company’s penetration and country wise presence across all distribution channels.

 

The report covers a detailed competitive outlook that includes the market share and company profiles of key players operating in the Europe market. Key players profiled in the report include Atlas Roofing Corporation, Duro-Last Roofing Inc., GAF, Johns Manville, The 3M Company, Sika AG and so on.

node.title: Global Bicycle Gearbox System Market; By Gear System: Derailleurs, 3 speed Gear Hubs, 7 & 14 speed Gear Hubs; By Components: Counter Shaft, Mainshaft, Gears, Bearing; By Bi-cycle Type: Road bicycle, Cyclo-cross Bicycle, Racing Bicycle, Touring Bicycle, Mountain Bicycles, Hybrid Bicycles, Triathlon Bicycles: Research, Analysis, Insights, and Forecast through 2017-2025
node.market:
Preamble:

Bicycle gearbox is a kind of gearing system used in bicycles. The gearbox of a bicycle serves the purpose to transform rotational speed and torque to what is wanted at the drive wheels. This gearbox system is used in bicycle instead of a hub gear or derailleur gears. The bicycle gearbox offers advantages which include protecting the gearing system from dirt and damage, and also improves the shifting performance. In the automation industry, gearboxes used allow the vehicle to achieve different speed combination and torque. Bicycle gearbox is generally used for power transmission and the requirement of this device assists in controlling the speed and as well as change the torque of the bicycle according to road condition and the rider’s need.. Gear box can also be referred as transmission box and is considered to be the second component of the power train in a bicycle. High adoption of bicycle gearbox system in new generation bicycles shows huge market potential during the forecast period.

Notable industry movements:

Gearbox system in a bicycle is the most crucialpart. With the rise in demand of high speed bicycles there is also a rise in demand for bicycle gearbox system. Bicycle gearbox being a new advancement in the automotive industrythere is a huge market potential during the forecast period. According to latest market trend, development of bicycle gearbox system is gaining tractiondue to increase in number of high end bicycles. There are several benefits related to the use of gearbox system in bicycle that are torque multiplication, inertia matching and speed control. The rise in demand of high end bicycleshas been a driving factor for the bicycle gearbox system market.

However, with this there are some de-merits with the bicycle gearbox system. Majorly, the problem is purchasing cost of bicycles having gearbox system which may degrade the market growth. Moreover, with this any fault in the gearing system may also lead to fatal accident. These problems can show a degradation level in the global bicycle gearbox system market.

By geography, Bicycle Gearbox market is segmented into North America, Europe, Asia-Pacific, Middle East and Africa and Latin America. Currently, North America and Europe is influencing over thebicycle gearbox system market and it is assumed that this region will hold half of the total market share during the forecast period. Presence of several high end bicycles in this region has augmented the growth of bicycle gearbox in this region. The market growth for bicycle gearbox system is at a nascent stage in regions like Asia-Pacific and Middle East and Africa. Although, in a few couple of years to come, countries like China, India and Australia are expected to augment the market growth of bicycle gearbox system during the forecast period.

On a global basis, key leaders operating this bicycle gearbox system market are Efneo, PA Pinions, Effigear SAS, Fallbrook Technologies Inc., Suntour, Shimano and Rohloff AG among others.

node.title: Global Motorcycle Airbag Jacket Market; By Technology: Cord and Cordless: Research, Analysis, Insights, and Forecast through 2016-2025
node.market:
Preamble:

Motorcycle airbag jacket is a type of personal protective equipment that is used to upgrade motorcycle safety system. The motorcycle jacket is equipped with airbag system which serves its purpose at the time of accident by reducing the force of impact at the time of collision. The demand for motorcycle airbag jacket is increasing with the rise of high performance sports bikes. Moreover, in many countries it becomes a trend to wear this kind of personal protective equipment so as to enhance the look as well as riding safety. This device (motorcycle airbag jacket) is automatically filled by gas that is being released from a carbon dioxide cylinder and is worn over a standard vest. Apart from car air bags the motorcycle airbags can be reloaded and repacked with new CO2 cartridge for reuse. Motorcycles are considered as the most endangered way of transport as compared to other vehicles such as trucks, passenger cars, buses and other vehicles. Further down, in recent days motorcycles are equipped with high speed engines which adds greater risk for the rider. In the event of an accident or a crash, motorcycle rider lacks the protection level thus rising the probability of getting injured. Due to the increasing number of accidents and injuries the motorcycle airbag jacket is expected to flourish the market growth during the forecast period.

Notable industry movements:

For any moving vehicle, safety is the most important part. With the rise in demand of high speed motorcycles there is also a rise in demand for motorcycle airbag jacket. Motorcycle airbag jacket being a new advancement in safety system there is a huge market potential during the forecast period. In recent days, most of the airbags supplied by the manufacturers are operated by the help of a cord. Major motorcycle manufacturer Ducati and Dainese (manufacturer of motorcycles protective wear) have collaborated together in the making of wireless motorcycle airbag jacket. According to latest market trend, development of motorcycle airbag jacket is gaining traction which is based on safety reasons. The motorcycle airbag jacket imparts extra protection to the body parts of a rider. The airbag jacket provides protection to body parts such as side ribs area, front chest area, spine areas, the back area and also gives a support to the neck. The rise in demand of safety standards has been a driving factor for the motorcycle airbag jacket market.

However, with this there are some downsides with the motorcycle airbag jacket. Majorly, the problem is purchasing cost of motorcycle airbag jacket which may degrade the market growth. Moreover, with this any fault in the wiring system may also lead to fatal accident.

Presence of several high end motorcycles in this region has augmented the growth of motorcycle airbag jacket in this region. Further down, in a few couple of years to come Europe being the heart of motorcycle racing, will also be on the verge to augment the market growth of motorcycle airbag jacket during the forecast period.

On a global basis, key leaders operating this motorcycle airbag jacket market are Dainese, MotoAir, Alpinestars, Air-Vest, and Helite among others.

node.title: Global Automotive Steer-by-Wire (SBW) Market: By Component: Physical Component (Steering Actuator, Feedback Motor, Angular Sensors) and Software Component: By Vehicle: Passenger Vehicle, Commercial Vehicle: Research, Analysis, Insights, Size, Growth and Forecast through 2016-2025
node.market:
Preamble:

Steering system of a vehicle is the connection of components and linkages which allows the vehicle to turn in the desired directions. Various kinds of steering mechanism provided in cars are like the Rack and Pinion type steering mechanism, Recirculating Ball type steering mechanism and others. Steering system can also be categorized into two parts. One is the manual steering system and the other one is the power-assisted steering system. However in recent market trends, Steer-by-wire (SBW) system is having a great impact in the automobile sector. Steer-by-wire (SBW) is the next generation stage of automobile steering system. Electronic steering offers good configuring in steering functionality of the vehicle. It provides better design flexibility than any other direct drive system. Improved quality of electrical and electronic products has proved to be beneficial for steer-by-wire systems.

In the automotive industry, steer-by-wire or drive-by-wire technology is the use of electrical or electro-mechanical systems for performing better steering function. The technology further improves the human-machine interface by using electronic control system thus providing a better steering control of a vehicle. Also, due to the steer-by-wire (SBW) technology the fuel efficiency of vehicles has also increased due to the reduced weight post SBW implementation.

 

Notable industry movements:

Automotive steering system being the main line of control of the driver with the automobile, there is an increasing advancement in the steering system of automobile industry, Steer-by-wire (SBW) system being one of them. SBW technology has the intention of achieving a fully autonomous vehicle technology (AVT). Automotive steer-by-wire system being a new advancement in steering system there is a huge market potential during the forecast period. In the last couple of years some major automotive manufacturers such as Nissan, Infinity have already established this new steering system. Steer by wire or Direct Adaptive Steering offers quicker steering response by keeping the vehicle away from vibration and thus providing a comfortable drive by improving the vehicles lane control system. Automobile manufacturer Infiniti is the first to bring this steer by wire system in market in their Q50 hybrid model. Moreover with this, SBW system improves the safety measurements by providing better quality of control such as Adaptive Cruise Control and Lane Assist Systems. This is projected to augment the popularity of steer-by-wire (SBW) market.

However, with this there are also some downsides with steer-by-wire system. Firstly, the major problem with this system is that consumers cannot gain trust on this SBW technology. So, there is degradation in the sales market. Secondly, the cost of SBW system is often higher than any other system. Moreover, any kind of failure in the control system can result to a tremendous accident of the vehicle.

By geography, automotive steer-by-wire system market is segmented into Europe, Latin America, North America, Asia-Pacific and rest of the world. In developing countries like China, India, and others there is an increasing demand in the automotive steering system. More than that, Europe has become the most important part to capture the automotive SBW system market and has occupied mostly overall market share. Europe being the largest manufacturer of motor vehicles in the automobile sector has been bringing advancement in the R&D region. Therefore, the demand for automotive steer-by-wire market is set to grow thus bringing change in lifestyle.

Key leaders:         

On a global basis, key leaders operating this automotive steer-by-wire system market are Nissan Motor Company Ltd., Bosch, JTEKT, Paravan, among others.

node.title: Automotive Switches Market, By Type: Knob Switch, Rotary Switch, Push Button Switch, Toggle Switch: By Application: Interior HVAC Controls, Steering Wheel Controls, Lighting Control, Transmission Control, Body Control (Doors, Windows, Trunk, Infotainment): Research, Analysis, Insights, Size, Growth and Forecast through 2016-2025
node.market:
Preamble:

Automotive switches are one of the major components that provide the control of intelligent mechanical structures and electronic systems. The switches enablethe driver to manage various functions from power window, mirror systems to temperature control and others. With the recent technological innovations and up gradation in vehicle control systems, the switches play a major role in any vehicular control.

Goal:

The global automotive industry is growing atan unprecedented rate, the technology is pouring in parallel. Given the worldwide production reaching almost 94.5 million, up 4.5 percent from that of 2015, the profit margins of OEM and suppliers are at all time high compared to last 10 years.

Notable industry movements:

OEM’s arein constant focus of the customer needs starting from autonomous features, electrification of components to human machine interface. OEM’s are identifying the major need for vehicle features that can be implementedwithin a compact area with digital features, for which they are partnering with tech designers who have more expertise in designing and producing digital components and software. For example, BMW and Toyota has a partnership with Microsoftto provide the glimpse of advanced technology features to their customers.

The notable improvement in the automotive switch in the recent years that changed the whole dynamics of the automotive industry is from keys to keyless entry and start will be followed by a switch to remote less key system and start. Moreover, the growing demands of electric and hybrid cars further supported the growth of the automotive switch market. In addition, the increasing demand of infotainment and other autonomous features in the passenger vehicle will boostthe automotive switch market. Fluctuating price of raw materials is hindering the growth for the market as the OEM’s are compelled to implementthe advanced features in the economy cars mostly in passenger cars segment. The technological advancements like infotainment and other advanced driver assistance system in the commercial vehicle segment posing a huge opportunity for the market.

The automotive switches market is segmented by various types like Knob switch, Rotary switch, Push button switch, toggle switch and others. Further, the switch market is also segmented by application type in automotive such as, Control module system, Transmission system, HVAC System and other control systems.

node.title: Automotive Infotainment System (In-car Entertainment) Market: By System: Hardware System and Software Solutions, By Technology: Navigation System, Rear Seat Entertainment System, Multimedia System, Audio System, By Application: Passenger Vehicles and Commercial Vehicles: Research, Analysis, Insights, Size, Growth and Forecast through 2016-2025
node.market:
Preamble:

Automotive Infotainment is becoming one of the key deciding factors in customer’s buying pattern and choice of vehicle. Currently, automotive world is slowly transforming into new levels of functionalities where the product range is diversified in the form of navigation system, driver assistance system, and high performance data sharing and personalized multimedia system.In-vehicle entertainment system comprises of differenttype of electronic devices required for vehicle entertainment and infotainment solutions. The infotainment system is slowlytransforming the ordinary car into a smart car with enhanced up gradation within the audio system, navigation system, entertainment system along with other driver assistance system.

Goal:

The global automotive infotainment industry is growing ata significant rate, with opportunities in both passenger vehicles and commercial vehicles. The increasing awareness among the consumers and regulations towards passenger safety is driving the infotainment market in automotive industry.

Notable industry movements:

The in-car infotainment system is becoming more sophisticated with the rise in demand of connected vehicles. The vendors across the value chain are working together to meet the demand for the in-car entertainment system. The electronics and software suppliers, the OEM’s and the telecom service providers are competing amongst themselves to providethe infotainment system safer and user friendly. OEM’s are also deploying their own infotainment system making the market more competitive. For example Ford Motors has come up with MyFord Touch and SYNC, Toyota has also come up with CUE (Cadillac User Experience),Cadillac, and Entune.

The automotive industry is highly saturated with the number of OEMs, each eying to get edge over the marketshare; and here the in-car infotainment system acts as a key differentiator. The OEM’s offer unique solutions with larger display, fast processor, innovative software solutions, and updated hardware systems to deliver unmatched experience for their customers.The rising trend of smartphones, adoption of mobility solutions, increasing demand for rear seat entertainment systems, and growing penetration of electronic components in vehicles provides a fertile environmentfor the growth of infotainment systems. In relation to automation within the vehicles, the software segment is also having a transformative effect on automotive infotainment system. The recent mergers and acquisitions as well as investment by Tier one suppliers to gain more software expertise over their hardware is one of the notable movement in this particular area. For example, Continental AG acquired Elektrobit to serve software solutions in the area of navigation, ADAS and HMI. Moreover, Harman acquired Symphony Teleca in order to gain advantages over software integration and engineering services. Visteon also acquired AllGo Embedded, to provide software solutions in the field of navigation, multimedia playback and in-device connectivity.

node.title: Automotive Inductive Wireless Charging Market, By type: Electromagnetic induction, Magnetic Resonance, By Application: Passenger vehicle and Commercial Vehicle: Research, Analysis, Insights, Size, Growth and Forecast through 2016-2025
node.market:
Preamble:

The global automotive industry is currently experiencing transition from gasoline to electric vehicles, hybrid cars and autonomous cars. Electric vehicles demand is growing considerably, but the major challenge for it is charging. The electric vehicles battery technology is quite mature. Each manufacturer has their own battery charger however they can be compatible with other vehicles. Convenient EV charging infrastructure is expected to become a key factor for the growth of electric vehicles market. The electric charging points are growing significantly globally; there are about 16,000 public charging stations in the U.S with a jump of around 15% from last year. From 2011, electric vehicles sales rise about 700% in 2016.To factor in these challenges some companies are manufacturing inductive wireless charging system that is compatible for all the electric cars.

Goal:

The global automotive inductive wireless charging system market is growing atan unprecedented rate, gaining more popularity in China and the U.S. The technology in charging system is being modified by companies like Qualcomm which is expected to bring a revolutionary change in electric vehicle market.

Notable industry movements:

Wireless charging for EVs is on the verge of initial deployment, with the Mercedes-Benz S500e plug-in hybrid by 2018. The technology is already being piloted in some of the community bus system. The inductive wireless charging system will use electromagnetic energyto transmit power between the two coils. In wireless vehicle charging, the energy moves from a transmitter coil, encased in a pad that sits on pavement, to a receiver coil housed in a pad underneath a vehicle. On the distant horizon, motorists may be able to get a charge from coils embedded in roadways as they travel along.

Some of the luxury vehicle manufacturers are already planning to deploythe technology by 2017. For example, Mercedes is planning to implementthe wireless charging system on the face-lifted S500e plug-in hybrid sedan. BMW is also planning to deploythe technology in its i8 plug-in hybrid and i3 electric vehicle with collaboration with Mercedes Benz on the wireless technology. Like BMW and Mercedes Benz, several other automakers are also looking for the inductive wireless charging systemtechnology. The inductive wireless charging will help the drivers to top up the mileage over electromagnetic charging pads either on the pavement or embedded in it.

A company called EVAtran already offers aftermarket wireless charging units for the first-generation Chevrolet Volt ($1,260), Nissan Leaf ($1,540) and Cadillac ELR ($1,940).Also; Toshiba has been using a wireless static rechargeable battery system to energize buses that provide regular service in Japan between All Nippon Airways Co. Ltd. facilities in Kawasaki and the vicinity of Haneda Airport in Tokyo.

The increase in sales of plug in hybrid vehicle globally supported the growth of the inductive wireless charging market. In addition, the increase in investment of infrastructure for electric vehicles supported by the government regulation will fuel the market further. The high installation cost, lesser efficiency and increasing cost pressure is majorly hindering the growth from inductive wireless charging system market.

The automotive inductive wireless charging market is segmented broadly by geography which in turn can be sub divided into region specific.

node.title: Global Road Train Engines and Trailers Market; By Road Trains, B-double, B-triple, AB triple, BAB quad, C-train, Dog-trailer; By Road Train Engines, Kenworth T909, Volvo FH160, Mack Titan 6*4, Superliner 6*4 MP10, Freightliner Coronado 122, Kenworth T659, Mack CLR Superliner, Kenworth T609: Research, Analysis, Insights, Size, Growth and Forecast through 2016-2025
node.market:
Preamble:

Road train engines and trailers refer to a kind of trucking vehicle which helps in the improvement of transportation system .In Australia this term “Road Train” is most often used, whereas in countries like United States and Canada the term “Triples,” ”Turnpike Doubles” and “Rocky Mountain Doubles” are used to refer Longer Combination Vehicles(LCVs). Road train engine comprises of highly powered engine of around 450 or 500 horsepower which has the capability to tow more than one trailer at a time. Usage of this vehicle type makes freight move efficiently from one region to another. The purpose of this vehicle type is that it helps in transporting goods in bulk which is a proven form of logistics.. This trucking concept is mainly used in remote and urban areas of developed countries.

The road train trailer arrangement is done in the following way. B-double that consists of a prime mover which tows the lead trailer. The B-triple which is same as the B-double consisting of an additional lead trailer behind the prime mover. AB triple consists of a prime mover, a semi-trailer, a converter dolly and then linked by a B-double. The BAB quad consists of two B-double units attached to a converter dolly. The C-train is a semi trailer attached to the C-dolly which is connected to another trailer in front of it. The Dog-trailer is the one which is linked to a converter dolly.  

 

Market growth:

Time management being an important aspect of industrial-sector, the timely delivery of raw-materials is necessary for effective manufacturing which in turn is expected to augment the Road train engines and trailers market through the forecast period. Pertaining to their capability of carrying huge load of goods especially by towing multiple trailers at a time, these trucking vehicles are significant in delivering goods to desired destination on specified time.

 

However road train engines being enormous in size and due to its gigantic weight it is restricted to carry any operation in hilly areas. More than that truckies driving this type of truck needs to be highly experienced and should have a proper license to drive such kind of vehicle. Moreover in different countries these trucks on public roads are limited to a certain number of trailers or there is a limitation on the length of the trailer. For example, in the United States trucks are limited to tow two to three trailers at one time whereas, in some European countries trucks with trailers are allowed to a certain length of 25.25 m (82.8  ft).

Infotainment system refers to the broadcast material which delivers a combination of entertainment and information content. The content delivered through infotainment is designed to be informative yet entertaining to achieve consumer’s interest. Motorcycle infotainment provides various information such as fuel economy, altitude, display tire pressure, miles left until next oil change, and fuel range. This provides sufficient information and also serves to be an entertaining purpose to the consumers.

In recent market trends, modern motorcycles are equipped with infotainment system. The infotainment system serves to be a major part of modern automotive vehicles. The rise in demand of infotainment system in motorcycles has emerged in the recent years thus augmenting the growth of motorcycle infotainment system market through the recent years. With the rise in number of electronics manufacturers, many electronics giants such as Sony, Toshiba, Pioneer and Panasonic are developing their products to provide better purpose of the infotainment system. In the last couple of years, motorcycle infotainment system market was driven by heavy weight motorcycles. However, gradually down the line, adoption of infotainment system in mid segment motorcycles is expected during the forecast period. Along with this Vehicle to Vehicle (V2V) and smartphone technologies is making an advancement or development of smart infotainment systems. Large players such as Yamaha, Ducati is also bringing development in infotainment system. This is projected to augment the popularity of motorcycles infotainment system among consumers with increasing disposable income. During the forecast period, Trikes is expected to be the fastest growing segment in the motorcycle infotainment system market. Trikes are vehicles with three wheels which are specially designed for aged people and also offer a comfortable continuous ride. Advancement in the technological part of motorcycle infotainment system will fuel the growth of this market globally. Moreover, chip manufacturers are increasing their focus on automotive grade semiconductors which leads to a rapid advancement in the infotainment system of motorcycles. Henceforth, motorcycle infotainment market is expected to grow during the forecast period.

In recent times heavy bikes or high end bikes are provided with this infotainment system. The high price range of infotainment system couple with the price of high end motorcycles are hindering the growth of the market. Hence, automobile manufacturing companies aim to provide infotainment system in mid-luxury motorcycle as the market for mid-luxury motorcycles plays a high potential segment for infotainment systems. node.title: Global High Performance Hybrids Market; By Types Full Hybrids, Mild Hybrids, Plug-in Hybrids; By Component, •Prime Mover, Electric Motor, Batteries, Controller, DC/AC Inverter, DC/DC Converter: Research, Analysis, Insights, Size, Growth and Forecast through 2016-2025
node.market:
Preamble:

High performance hybrid refers to modern technology hybrid vehicles which combines both internal combustion (I.C) engines and as well as an electric motor to drive the vehicle. These vehicles can be considered fuel efficient and smart. High performance hybrids consume less amount of gasoline thus occurring less pollution and hence can prove to be valuable for the environment. The rise in demand of high performance hybrids have emerged in the recent years thus augmenting the growth of the High performance hybrids market through the recent years. The characteristic of hybrid cars in avoidance of fuel stations seem to boost the interest of automobile companies in further offering of hybrid cars. Hybrid cars and Electric Vehicles (EV’s) can also be termed as green cars. These vehicles are fuel efficient cars and reduce emission by shutting down the internal combustion engine (ICE) when idle and again restarting it when required.

Notable industry movements:

High performance hybrid vehicles are new generation automobiles with huge market potential during the forecast period majorly due to the rising cost of gasoline prices which stimulates the market growth for hybrid vehicles. In the last couple of years some the major automotive manufacturers have already established high performance hybrid vehicle models such as Prius V, Fusion Energi, and these models are doing good particularly in US and Western Europe. As of 2016-17, major companies such as Tesla, Toyota, Ford and others are investing considerable amount of resources to come up with new and advanced models of high performance hybrid vehicles. This is projected to augment the popularity of high performance hybrid vehicles among consumers with increasing disposable income. Moreover, high performance hybrid vehicles will bring a difference due to its almost zero emissions and the money that can be saved on fuels.

However along with this there are also some downsides with High performance hybrid vehicles. Firstly, the chemicals needed to run this type of vehicles are not eco-friendly. Although, more use of these type of vehicles can surely bring improvement in its segment. Secondly, it’s the lack of information to consumer due to which there is a misconception on the new hybrid technology that deviates consumers from buying. Thirdly, the main cause is the high initial cost of high performance hybrid vehicles which results in low sales. The cost of the battery used in hybrid or EV vehicles alone can range between USD 3900 – USD9300 which is equivalent to the cost of a new IC (Internal Combustion) engine powered vehicle.

HCV (Heavy Commercial Vehicle) is referred to vehicles having GVW (Gross Vehicle Weight) of 16 ton and above. To meet several government regulations in emission and fuel efficiency across the globe, the OEM’s are investing considerably in research and development activities for heavy commercial vehicles. Recently the increasing uses of telematics and cross industry partnerships have offered a change in product transportation.

HCV parts and components of any particular vehicle are the spare parts or repair parts or replacement parts which are manufactured to replace the Original Equipment (OE) parts when they are damaged. It comprises of mainly the brakes, shock absorber, gearbox parts, clutch and others. This parts and components on compiling together form a whole unit.

HCV aftermarket parts and components is a secondary market of the automotive industry. The automotive aftermarket mainly deals with the manufacturing, remanufacturing, distribution, and installation of all vehicle parts, equipment and accessories after the vehicle has been sold by the Original Equipment Manufacturer (OEM) to the consumer. Furthermore, aftermarket parts can be divided into two categories. One is the replacement part and the other one is accessories. Replacement parts are automotive parts which are remanufactured to replace the Original Equipment (OE) parts. Accessories are those parts that are built for comfort, convenience, performance and safety. These parts are re-designed for later add-on after the sale of the vehicle.

Notable industry movements:

In the last couple of years, HCV (Heavy Commercial Vehicles) such as trucks and trailers have shown a projected decline in sales. However, during the forecast period, the demand of heavy commercial vehicles is expected to surge, due to better economic development and low fuel price. Moreover, all the HCV’s sold earlier needs to be serviced yearly, which makes the aftermarkets more competitive.. Due to this reason HCV parts and components is projected to augment the aftermarket demand. Major manufacturers such as HEFEI DONGLING ASAHI METALS INDUSTRIES CO., LTD, ALP AUTOMOTIVE, ZHUJI DONGSAN AUTO PARTS FACTORY and others are doing good in the aftermarket sales of HCV’s parts and components. node.title: Global Automotive Filter Market, By Filter Type: Air Filter, Oil Filter, Fuel Filter, Cabin Air Filter; By Vehicle Type: Passenger Cars, Light Commercial Vehicles (LCVs), Heavy Commercial Vehicles (HCVs); By End-user: OEM, Aftermarket: Research, Analysis, Insights, Size, Growth and Forecast through 2016-2025

Filters are devices used to remove impurities or solid particles from liquid or gas passing through it. Filters used in automobiles can be of different types such as Air filter, Oil filter, Fuel filter and Cabin air filter. The purpose of air filter is to remove solid impurities such as dust, bacteria and others from air. Oil filter are specially designed filter which serves the purpose of removing contaminants from engine oil, lubrication oil and others. Fuel filters is also a kind of filter which is generally placed in the fuel line to screen out dirt particles from the fuel and is mostly found in internal combustion engines. Similarly, the function of cabin air filter is that it processes the air entering the passenger compartment that is through the vehicles heating or air conditioning system thus providing comport to the passenger by trapping dust particulates.

According to recent market trends, modern vehicles are equipped with filter which serves to be major part of automobiles. The rise in demand of automotive filter has emerged in the recent years thus augmenting the growth of automotive filter market. Out of this the cabin air filter and also the air filter segments are expected to show a rise in growth whereas the oil filter segment is expected to be the largest market in terms of revenue. In terms of volume the aftermarkets in automotive filter has a huge growth potential with respect to OEM (Original Equipment Market) market. The major rise in demand of the market is majorly due to the increasing rate in production of vehicles, and the periodic maintenance of the vehicles which are already in operation.

However, with this there are also some downsides associated with oil and fuel filter market. The rise in demand for electric vehicles and plug-in hybrid vehicles acts as a restraining factor for automotive filter market, thus hampering the growth of the automotive filter market.

node.title: Global Automotive Exhaust Gas Sensor Market, By Sensor Type: O2 Lambda sensor, NOX Sensors, Particulate matter Sensors, Differential Pressure Sensors, Temperature Sensors, MAP-MAF Sensors; By Vehicle Type: Passenger Cars, Light Commercial Vehicles (LCVs), Heavy Commercial Vehicles (HCVs), Two-Wheelers: Research, Analysis, Insights, Size, Growth and Forecast through 2016-2025

Preamble:

Exhaust Gas sensor is a type of device which automatically detects high levels of harmful gases such as carbon monoxide or any other abnormal gases present in the vehicle exhaust. Gas sensors or gas detectors detects the presence of gases in an area and this device is considered to be a part of the safety system.

The growth in making of small integrated circuits helps in the growth prospects for global automotive exhaust gas sensor market. Along with this, there is also an increase in adoption of micro-electromechanical sensors (MEMS) which is a miniaturized type of the traditional ICs that is produced during micro fabrication technology. The use of micro fabrication technology has made the exhaust gas sensors more accurate and reliable by increase in the response time, efficiency and communication capabilities. Furthermore, many major manufacturers of sensor are investing in the R&D section to produce better micro fabrication technology that can boost the entire revenue generation from automotive exhaust gas sensors. According to the recent market trend, modern vehicles are equipped with gas sensors and serves to be a major part of the automobile. The rise in demand of exhaust gas sensor has emerged in the recent years thus augmenting the growth of automotive exhaust gas sensor. High adoption of automotive exhaust gas sensor in new generation vehicles shows huge market growth potential during the forecast period.

Notable industry movements:

There are various exhaust gas sensors present in the market such as NOX sensor, O2 Lambda sensor, MAP-MAF sensor and others. Among this the NOX sensor having sensor control unit which operates independently is gaining momentum in the market. NOX sensors are smart sensors that have an integrated sensor control unit which allows sensor to come into action independently of the automobile’s ECU (Electronic Control Unit). The major rise in demand of this automotive exhaust gas sensor is due to the increasing demand for passenger cars. This high adoption of passenger cars is augmenting the growth of automotive exhaust gas sensor market during the forecast period.

However, there are also some downsides associated with the automotive exhaust gas sensor market. The rise in demand or the increasing sales of electric vehicles (EVs) is restraining the need for automotive exhaust gas sensor market.  Furthermore, the high initial price of automobile exhaust gas sensor also stands out for the major restraining factor in the exhaust gas sensor market.

node.title: Global Automotive (Cars, Motorcycles, Commercial Vehicles, Racing) High Performance Braking System Market, By Brake Component: Discs, Calipers, Brake Pad, Rotor; By Material: Carbon Ceramic, Aluminum; By End-user: OEM, Aftermarket; By Vehicle Type: Cars, Motorbikes, Commercial Vehicles and Racing Vehicles: Research, Analysis, Insights, Size, Growth and Forecast through 2016-2025
node.market:
Preamble:

Automotive high performance braking system is a modern technology braking system. A brake is a kind of mechanical device which absorbs the energy from a moving system thus resulting in slowing or stopping of the vehicle. The stopping of the vehicle is done by means of friction. The brake caliper is brought together to the master cylinder through hoses, valves and tubes which helps in passing of the brake fluid through the system. As engine power increases, there is a rise in demand in the market of braking system thus augmenting the growth of high performance braking system. Due to higher speed of vehicles high performance brakes are required which could stop the vehicle in proper time. Disc brake, hydraulic brakes are examples of automotive high performance braking system. In case of disc brake, brake calipers are used to firmly press pairs of pad against the disc, due to which friction is created and thus results in either decreasing of the rotational speed of the wheel or to hold it stationary. Disc brakes are more easily cooled and also offer better performance than drum brakes. Further down, hydraulic brakes is also a kind of high performance braking mechanism which uses brake fluid to transfer pressure from controlling mechanism to braking mechanism.

High performance braking system is widely used in racing cars and has also become a part of high-end sport cars. High performance brake pad has good friction level and can maintain this level of performance throughout the entire braking cycles. Automotive high performance brake system works effectively under load and heat conditions thus having good durability.

Notable industry movements:

For any moving vehicle brakes is the most critical component. With the rise in demand of luxury vehicles there is also a rise in demand for high performance brakes as they can bear heat generation. High performance braking being a new advancement in braking system which is basically based on adaptive technology is expected to huge market potential during the forecast period. This braking system type inherits of double floating brake caliper in the front axle that reduces the transfer of heat to the brake fluid and in the rear axle braking is done by means of sliding frame type caliper. Moreover the high performance braking system which is usually lightweight and durable also has a feature to wipe off the film of water present on the brake discs. Recently, Ford chooses Brembo for the high performance braking system for its iconic Ford GT model. The Ford GT model is equipped with carbon ceramic brake rotors with high performance brake pads both in the front and rear wheels. With high performance at elevated temperatures these brakes are comparatively lightweight than the weight of cast-iron discs. Moreover, with greater scope of customization, these brakes also offer the customers a choice of five caliper colors. Novitech is also providing superior braking solution with carbon ceramic brake shoe for Tesla X model. Further, the growing popularity of automotive racing events in the developing countries boosted the growth of high performance braking system market.

However, with this there is a downside with high performance braking technology. Majorly, the problem is rising cost of automotive Original Equipment Manufacturers (OEM) which stands out to be major restrains of the market.

node.title: Wearable Medical Devices Market, Analysis & Forecast through 2024
node.market:
Preamble:

Since the last few years, the term ’wearable medical devices’ has come into account and is gaining burgeoning demand in the market. Wearable medical devices are actually non-invasive, autonomous biosensors,which monitors a specific (sometimes multiple) medical function to get proper physiological data and records them. Thus, wearable medical devices help its user to monitor different health paradigms for a measured period of time on personal or professional level. These devices are small size, light in weight, easily wearable on the human body or on a piece of clothing and user – friendly even among geriatric population.

Wristbands, smart watches, smart clothing, pacemakers, activity monitors and many others use to cater these kinds of devices.

Usability:

These wearable health aids help in monitoring blood glucose, blood oxygen saturation level, skin temperature , heart rate, electro cardio graph and in monitoring many chronic diseases.Primarily, wearable market device got admiration for tracking fitness levels, different physical activities and sleeping obstructions(in sleep apnea cases).

Wearable market devices have decreased the frequency of in-person visits to clinics and hospitals and haveallowed the physicians to control remotely any metabolic changes happening in their patients within seconds. Another privilege is getting warnings for diagnose serious diseases from patient’s viewpoint, as it is impeding the cost of long hospital stay.

Notable industry movements:

Restraining factors:

node.title: Stents Market, Analysis and Forecast through 2024
node.market:
Preamble:

Stents are tiny but expandable metal or plastic mesh tubes, used for treating narrowed restrictions in our body, to keep the effected passageway(may be an artery, a blood vessel, an ureter or any other body part) open. Primarily, the process of inserting stent inside the body is called stenting.

In case of coronary heart disease, this stenting helps by-

  • Treating heart attack
  • Widening arterial constrictions and
  • Reducing chest pain(Angina)

This whole intervention is called as percutaneous coronary intervention or angioplasty, which is overruling coronary artery bypass surgery owing to a somewhat less invasive surgery with minimal recovery time along with less trauma and pain as well.

Type of stents & their usage:

Major kind of stent is coronary, vascular and biliary type, but many other kind of stents as given below are also coming in limelight in present days.

  • Coronary stents are inserted in the coronary arteries during a coronary angioplasty.
  • Vascular stents are used in case of peripheral artery angioplasty.
  • Ureteral stents are used in ureter passage in case of gall bladder stone or cancer.
  • Prostatic stents are used in case of benign prostatic hypertrophy.
  • Esophageal stents are used in case of esophageal cancer.

In current years, ultramodern technological advancements has deceased the risk of thrombosis in stenting procedures(especially drug eluting stents). This has played a pivotal role in boosting its popularity among cardiologists and patient pool for opting stent invasions in coronary and peripheral artery diseases (instead of the conventional balloon angioplasty).

Notable industry movements:
  • Primary growth factor includes prevalence of cardiovascular diseases attributing to unhealthy lifestyle, increased consumption of alcohol among young generation, smoking and other usage of tobacco products, less physical activity, junk diet leading to obesity.
  • This obesity is giving rise to diabetes and hypertension, another risk factor for chest pain and heart blockages.
  • High blood cholesterol level and poor health of heart is also responsible for loosening of cardiac muscles, leading to ultimately heart failures.
  • Rising cases of chronic diseases among developed and developing nations such as heart failures, esophageal cancer, gall bladder cancer and growing geriatric population are leading to demand for more stent implants.
  • Technological advancements in stent systems (viz. invent of bioabsorbable stents) is further driving the stent market growth on a global basis. Many big players are also investing hugely into research and development for emerging new and useful products.
  • To improve the social life ona mass basis, there is a noticeable rise in adoption of stenting procedures rather than the conventional one amongst doctors and consumers, boosting the stent market henceforth.
  • However,strict legal and regulatory impediments for stents (since they are directly inserted inside the human body) are constraining the market growth.
  • High costing of stent implants, particularly the drug eluting stents; can be notified as major hindering factors in developing nations.
Segmentation:

node.title: Neurodisorder Market, Analysis and Forecast through 2024
node.market:
Preamble:

A neurological disorder is a disturbed physical condition affecting the brain along with Central Nervous System (CNS)and Peripheral Nervous System (PNS).These disorders include biochemical, structural or electrical malfunction inside the brain, spinal cord, cranial/ peripheral/ autonomic nervous system and muscles. These results in a range of symptoms include sensational loss, paralysis, and musculardystrophy, altered level of consciousness, poor coordination and body imbalance.

Until date, more than 600 kind of neurological diseases have already been reported among which some of the major are mentioned below:

  • Neuro-degenerative diseases, where nerve cells are damaged or die, such as Parkinson’s disease and Alzheimer’s disease
  • Problem with faulty nervous system development, such as ‘Spina bifida’
  • Diseases caused by faulty genes such as Huntington’s disease and Muscular dystrophy
  • Seizure disorders such as epilepsy
  • Injuries to the spinal cord and brain
  • Brain infections, such as meningitis
  • Diseases of the blood vessels that supply the brain such as stroke
  • Cancer such as brain tumours.

Presently, hundreds of millions of people are suffering from neurological disorders. According to ‘WORLD HEALTH ORGANIZATION Statistics’, more than 50million people are suffering through epilepsy, 24 million by Alzheimer’s disease and a wide amount of future generation is going to be affected by Dementia.

 This neurological burden has become a serious threat to the public health. This is expected to drive the neurological disorder drugs market to grow in the next couple of years.

Notable industry movements:

Presently,economy of neurological disorder drugs market is running at a slow pace, but prevalence of neurological diseases in all strata of age groups is expected to lead the market to degrees of success.

Drive factors:
  • In developed and developing countries of North America and Europe, life threatening neurological diseases is of major concern now days.
  • Frequent reported cases of rare neuro diseases from all over the world are also driving the market. Spreading knowledge about the common neurodiseases among mass population by government agencies will initiate the drive further.
  • Thrive in geriatric population is also a prime factor for this market growth, since target population of these diseases fall into this age group.
Restrain factors:

Since R&D costing for neurodisorder drugs are very high and have longer trial period, many pharmaceutical companies are not showing interest to enter in this market at current stage. Another reason is strict rules for prescribing those neurodrugs, which is restricting the neurological disorder drugs market growth.

Even though the companies are likely to introduce lesser-priced drugs with the advancements of distribution channel and production capacities.

Segmentation:

Basis

Types

Disorder

Epilepsy ,Parkinson’s disease, Alzheimer’s disease, Multiple Sclerosis, Cerebrovascular disease and others

Drug class

Antipsychotic, Antiepileptic, Analgesics, Anticholinergic, Hypnotic and sedative, Antihypertensive, Anticoagulants and others

Distribution and Channel segment

Retail pharmacy, Hospital pharmacy, e-commerce

 

Based on disorder, the market is dominated by cerebrovascular diseases and is expected to remain the same through the forecast period.

Geographical framework and growth trends:

From geographic point of view, the market is segmented into North America, Europe including CES, Asia Pacific, Latin or South America and Africa &Caribbean.

Due to increased number of epilepsy and dementia cases, North America is dominating the global therapeutics market followed by Europe. In Europe, these drugs are already catering the local market on a mass basis with a growing number of geriatric population and innovative drug trials.

As a result, new entrants are investing huge in research and development of innovative drugs with a competitive price and trying to make their footholds in major developing countries. Due to prevalent cases of neurological disorder diseases (increasing at the growth rate of 4% YOY); local and global companies are expected to penetrate developing regions such as India, Chinaand Africa, in the coming years.

In this market, basically new and old companies have to focus on innovative branding techniques, short but successful trials and developing cost effective neuromedicines. The companies should also concentrate on tabulating this market on the basis of therapeutic, technological and geographical areas for a successful growth in the forecast period.

node.title: Biomaterials Market, Analysis And Forecast Through 2024
node.market:
Preamble:

Biomaterials are those non-viable materials, which are natural or synthetic in nature and suited to treat or replace natural body tissues or organs on interaction with biological systems. Traditionally, biomaterials were used in military surgical operations. But in recent times, these had penetrated civilian sector at a rapid rate.

From ancient times, when bark bandages were pressed onto a wound, biomaterials had shown its presence.By 2016, doctors worldwide have implanted more than 200,000 pacemakers, 100,000 heart valves, one million orthopaedic devices and five million intraocular lenses approximately.These materials also giving proxy as bone substitute and collagen membranes etc. in regenerationprocess in orthopaedics as well as in regenerative dentistry.Naturally, this vivid use of implant is fostering the growth of ‘’Biomaterials market’’. Researchers are predicting a good future of this market, since biomaterials are backbone of major medical break such as joint replacements, prosthetic heart valves, cardiac pacemakers, kidney dialysis, hip replacement implants and many more. Mass development of such lifesaving products has leaded the growth in the fields of tissue engineering, material science etc. and has given a new platform to biomaterials market.

node.title: Bioinformatics Market, Analysis and forecast through 2024
node.market:
Preamble:

Bioinformatics is a term generated from combination of information technology, statistics, algorithms and molecular biology. In this process, biological molecules are organized to generate a cyclic data pattern. Bioinformatics majorly implicates its applications in recording, gene regulation analysis, gene and protein expression analysis, mutation analysis, and storage and genome annotation.

 In simpler words, bioinformatics help in storing, organising, retrieving and analysing any biological data; especially when it comes to genetic study; it is expecting to help in sequencing, annotating genomes and in characterising mutational traits.

Molecular medicines, preventive medicines, drug development, gene therapy, biotechnology and forensic microbial analysis all depends mainly on the research system of bioinformatics.

Goal:

Due to its current penetration and advance in technological levels, this market is expected to grow at moderately high rate in coming years.

Notable industry movements:

Growing demand for nucleic acid and protein sequencing, technological advancements and huge investment by developed economies government, research institutions and private players are the main factors driving the market of bioinformatics.

Secondary growth factor includes frequent usage of biological system modelling in clinical research field as well as more collaboration between companies and research institutes in recent years.Input of integrated biological data is like adding stars in the sky of drug discovery and its development pertaining to the bioinformatics market.

Nevertheless, high cost, lack of user-friendly tools, skilled personnel and absence of well-defined standard are hindering the bioinformatics market growth.
